channel.title: A lot of help needed!
channel.description:
Okay, I was going to make a few topics asking what to do, but I decided to put them in one topic.. Here goes:
[ul][li]How do I make it so NPC's will be in Varrock permanently?[/li] [li]What's the code for ::pnpc to work?[/li] [li]How do I change the starting positions?[/li] [li]How do I add items to shops?[/li] [li]How do I add people to commands? Say, I can spawn an npc, but 'Bob' can't. How do I add 'Bob' to the list?[/li] [li]How do I make it so when you click on an NPC, they don't die instantly, but you have to fight htem?[/li] [li]How do I make it so only Admin's can spawn items?[/li][/ul]

item.title: A lot of help needed!
item.dc:creator: @cmatuch cmatuch
item.description:
@cmatuch wrote:

Where in NPC.java do I change the HP?
And I don’t have shop.java or anything named shop.
And…there aren’t character rights in the source…this is what I get when I search for ‘else if (command.startsWith(“item”))’

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“item”))
{

	try
	{
		int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
		int x = currentX;
		int y = currentY;
		if (newitem <= 8000 && newitem >= 0)
			createItem(x,y,newitem);
		else
			sendMessage("Item Does Not Exist Within The MythScape II Database.");
	}
	catch(Exception e) 
	{
		sendMessage("[ID] Error"); 
	}	
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: A lot of help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Well for sertain people using certain commands there is something you add in your public voids I think…

Search for commands in client.java and when you come to the first one in should say something like

character rights == 3

If you want only administers to spawn change delete it from the character == 1 commands and add it to chracter rights == 3 commands (It is the same for all commands you want to change)

For the items open shop.cfg or whaterver in Ms word or Notepad and and change it there (if you need help post)

To make the NPC’s fightable open up Npc.cfg in MS word or Notepad and change its health

Hope this helped

Read full topic
